FuncDef: The display multicast outgoing-interface statistics slot command displays the usage of multicast outgoing interfaces on a specified board.
CLIs: display multicast outgoing-interface statistics slot <slot-id> [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value range varies with hardware.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast outgoing-interface statistics slot 1
Number of forwarding engines: 2
Forwarding engine 0:
Max number of multicast outgoing interfaces: 48000
Number of unused multicast outgoing interfaces: 9000
Number of used multicast outgoing interfaces: 39000
Forwarding engine 1:
Max number of multicast outgoing interfaces: 48000
Number of unused multicast outgoing interfaces: 6000
Number of used multicast outgoing interfaces: 42000
<HUAWEI> display multicast outgoing-interface statistics slot 1 verbose

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query the usage of multicast outgoing interfaces on a specified board, run the display multicast outgoing-interface statistics slot command. The command output includes the maximum number of multicast outgoing interfaces, number of used multicast outgoing interfaces, and number of unused multicast outgoing interfaces on the board.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
